ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Gordon finally responds
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the best option here would be a drop/No Drop switch.  If the switch it set to drop then everything is like it is now.  If it is set to No Drop then all
ygData.messageBody:
I think the best option here would be a drop/No Drop switch. If the switch
it set to drop then everything is like it is now. If it is set to No Drop
then all your act as No Drop items.

Rokenn
